text: A partner shall have no right to receive, and shall not be required to accept, a distribution in kind.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 41-154.2.

2001 Ed., § 33-104.02.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 402 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-604.02

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Relations of Partners to Each Other and to Partnership.
